nodes.text: Wyrn Otro worked for Galentro Heavy Works corporation, unswervingly loyal as he regarded it as his only family. He represented the corporation at the Pentastar Talks in 7 ABY. While he signed the Pentastar Alignment Treaty, recognizing the need to align with a party to avoid being absorbed into the New Republic, he had personal reservations about Moff Ardus Kaine, worrying that the formation of the Pentastar Alignment was only a way to gain personal power.
